content: coffin coaster designed by crochetcrafters1 © 2024 crochetcrafters1 - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you are welcome to sell finished products with your own photos in small quantities but if you do so please give pattern credit to crochetcrafters1 thank you and enjoy stitches and abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet inv decrease invisible decrease tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium - dark grey and white - yarn needle - scissors final size - height is 14 cm and width is 9 5 cm technical notes *at the end of each row is a stitch count in brackets *chains are not included in the stitch count coffin/coaster dark grey row 1 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each chain across 4 sts row 2 chain 1 turn make 2 half_double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts in the last st make 2 half_double_crochet 6 sts row 3 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 6 sts row 4 chain 1 turn make 2 half_double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next 4 sts in the last st make 2 half_double_crochet 8 sts row 5-6 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 8 sts row 7 chain 1 turn make 2 half_double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next 6 sts in the last st make 2 half_double_crochet 10 sts row 8-9 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 10 sts row 10 chain 1 turn make 2 half_double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next 8 sts in the last st make 2 half_double_crochet 12 sts row 11-12 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 12 sts row 13 chain 1 turn make 2 half_double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next 10 sts in the last st make 2 half_double_crochet 14 sts row 14 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next 10 sts make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease 12 sts row 15 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next 8 sts make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease 10 sts row 16 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next 6 sts make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease 8 sts row 17 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next 4 sts make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease 6 sts *fasten_off and use white yarn to sew on a cross link to video - https //youtu be/1ts7gk3rnf0 if you need help or have any questions feel
